name: <vec::Vec<T> as core::convert::From<&mut [T; N]>>::from

core::array::<impl [T; N]>::as_mut_slice.doc:
Returns a mutable slice containing the entire array. Equivalent to
 `&mut s[..]`.

core::convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

doc:
Allocates a `Vec<T>` and fills it by cloning `s`'s items.

 # Examples

 ```
 assert_eq!(Vec::from(&mut [1, 2, 3]), vec![1, 2, 3]);
 ```
